<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1383151_bkquest_borrow</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_1383151_bkquest_borrow">due_dateISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="due_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Fine calculation</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous) {
    var dueDate = new GlideDateTime(current.due_date);
    var returnDate = new GlideDateTime(current.returned_date || new GlideDateTime());

    // Calculate the difference in days between the due date and the return date
    var diffInDays = new GlideDuration(returnDate.getNumericValue() - dueDate.getNumericValue()).getDayPart();

    // Check if the book is returned after the due date
    if (diffInDays > 0) {
        // Calculate the fine amount based on the number of days overdue
        var finePerDay = 1.00; // Assuming a fine of $1 per day
        var fineAmount = diffInDays * finePerDay;

        // Set the fine amount on the record
        current.fine_amount = fineAmount;
    } else {
        // No fine if returned on or before the due date
        current.fine_amount = 0;
    }
})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>harini.srija</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-24 04:24:05</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>342d53b093bd8210ef267c5efaba10a6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Fine calculation</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="BookQuest" source="x_1383151_bkquest">327b26db93250210ef267c5efaba100f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="BookQuest">327b26db93250210ef267c5efaba100f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_342d53b093bd8210ef267c5efaba10a6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>harini.srija</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-24 07:17:43</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=342d53b093bd8210ef267c5efaba10a6"/></record_update>
